summary: Iteration 29 - E2E Testing after backend refactoring. All 26 backend tests passed (100%). All 8 main pages load correctly without errors.

minor.issue: Requires API key authentication - not accessible without credentials

issues: Chart width warnings in console (non-blocking) - charts render correctly

critical_code_review_comments: Backend refactoring successful - attendance module working correctly
All main pages load without errors: Dashboard, Attendance, Dipendenti, Fatture Ricevute, Prima Nota, F24, Classificazione Email, Documenti
Learning Machine API endpoint /api/learning-machine/dashboard returns 1967 documents with 22 categories
Attendance calendar shows 16 dipendenti with quick selection buttons (Presente, Assente, Ferie, etc.)
Prima Nota shows 14 movimenti with saldo €2,102,289.81
F24 page shows 68 modelli registrati with scadenze tracking
test_credentials: N/A - no auth required for tested endpoints
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend refactoring completed successfully. Attendance module at /api/attendance/ with endpoints: presenze-mese, dashboard-presenze, dipendenti-in-carico, note-presenze, genera-pdf-consulente. All main pages verified working.

Dashboard principale.details: Loads with Bilancio Istantaneo (€31,395.51 ricavi, €14,332.54 costi), Imposte 2026, Trend Mensile chart

Pagina Attendance (/attendance).details: Calendario presenze with 16 dipendenti, quick selection buttons, PDF Consulente export

Pagina Dipendenti (/dipendenti).details: Shows 34 dipendenti with search, list view, employee details panel

Pagina Fatture Ricevute (/fatture-ricevu.details: 34 fatture totali, €14,332.54 importo totale, 20 fornitori, action buttons (Vedi, Riconcilia, Cassa, Banca)

Pagina F24 (/f24).details: 68 Da Pagare, 1 CRITICAL scadenza (€6,578.13), 68 Modelli F24 Registrati

Pagina Classificazione Email (/classific.details: 3 tabs (Classificazione, Documenti, Regole), email scanning with 10 classification rules

Pagina Documenti (/documenti).details: 792 Documenti Totali, 568 Da Processare, 292 Processati, 706.64 MB Spazio Usato
